verses.name: 2 Kings 17:20
verses.text: And the Lord rejected all the seed of Israel, and afflicted them, and delivered them into the hand of spoilers, until he had cast them out of his sight.

verses.name: 2 Kings 17:21
verses.text: For he rent Israel from the house of David; and they made Jeroboam the son of Nebat king: and Jeroboam drave Israel from following the Lord, and made them sin a great sin.

verses.name: 2 Kings 17:22
verses.text: For the children of Israel walked in all the sins of Jeroboam which he did; they departed not from them;
